item.title: Converting Simplified Extended ISO8601 In Splunk
item.description: Wonder how to use the ISO8601 format in Splunk? Simplified extended ISO8601 is for example used in Javascript’s toISOString function. It’s a great way (readable and to timezone agnostic) to exchange timestamps between Splunk and Splunk Apps. Here’s how it’s done:

item.title: Run any React app as a Splunk app
item.description: If you want to run any React app (any React version, any toolkit) as a Splunk app, have a look at this gist:
